summary: A brief email from attorney Avrom Robin to an unidentified recipient, congratulating them on winning a bail appeal in the case United States v. Boustani. The email references case number 19-1018-cr and suggests a connection to Epstein.

events.title: Bail Appeal Victory in United States v. Boustani

keyFacts: The email references case number 19-1018-cr, United States v. Boustani.
The subject line includes 'Epstein, et al.', suggesting a potential link between the Boustani case and Jeffrey Epstein.
Attorney Avrom Robin congratulates an unidentified recipient on a bail appeal victory that occurred before the appeal was formally filed.
